definition: to draw (e.g. a bow)/to pull/to stretch sth/to extend/to lengthen/to involve or implicate in/to attract/to lead/to guide/to leave/to provide evidence or justification for/old unit of distance equal to 10 丈[zhang4], one-thirtieth of a km or 33.33 meters

sentences.english: Senegal says it will extradite Habre on Monday.
sentences.chinese: 塞內加爾表示將於星期一把哈佈雷引渡回乍得。

sentences.english: The English murderer was caught by the French police and extradited to Britain.
sentences.chinese: 那個英國殺人犯被法國警察抓獲引渡回英國。

sentences.english: They refused to extradite the hijackers to the U. S.
sentences.chinese: 他們拒絕把劫機犯人引渡到美國。

sentences.english: During the waiting extradition, the suspect will be detained.
sentences.chinese: 在等待引渡回國期間，這名嫌犯將被拘留。

sentences.english: But it has demanded the extradition of 20 terrorists based in Pakistan.
sentences.chinese: 而且已經要求將20名恐怖分子引渡回國。

sentences.english: The American murderer was caught by the English police and extradited to America.
sentences.chinese: 那名美國殺人犯在英國被警方抓獲後被引渡到美國。

sentences.english: France has applied to extradite her.
sentences.chinese: 法國提出引渡她的申請。

sentences.english: And Corporal Cesar Laurean could remain there for a year if he fights extradition .
sentences.chinese: 如果該名水兵拒絕引渡，他可能會在那待上一年。

sentences.english: Come to realize, the Bana open, bloody flower, the extradition of the Lost souls.
sentences.chinese: 恍然間，彼岸花開，血色花蕊，引渡着迷惘的遊魂。

sentences.english: His lawyers argue that extradition arrangements between Britain and the US are imbalanced.
sentences.chinese: 他的律師認爲英國與美國之間的引渡安排是不對等的。

sentences.english: The police arranged to extradite the murderer from the island state.
sentences.chinese: 警方設法把殺人犯從那個島國引渡回國。

sentences.english: Ratko Mladic will be extradited within 24 hours.
sentences.chinese: 姆拉迪奇將在24小時內被引渡。

sentences.english: I must order Mr. Assange be extradited to Sweden.
sentences.chinese: 我必須命令將阿桑齊引渡到瑞典。

sentences.english: The English murderer was caught by the French police and extradited from France to Britain.
sentences.chinese: 這個英國殺人犯被法國警察逮捕後被引渡回國。

sentences.english: The Requesting State may make a fresh request for extradition of the person for the same offence.
sentences.chinese: 請求國可以對同一犯罪再次提出引渡該人的請求。

sentences.english: A decision on whether to extradite Assange is expected to take several weeks.
sentences.chinese: 就是否引渡的決定阿桑格預計需要幾周時間。

definition: on trial (for a crime)/to stand trial
illegal immigration/to stowaway (on a ship)/to steal across the international border/to run a blockade
to repatriate (e.g. prisoners of war)/to send back
International Court of Justice in The Hague
